alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Cleburne; Etowah; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:53PM CDT until July 21 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TALLADEGA...CALHOUN...EASTERN ETOWAH...CENTRAL ST. CLAIR...NORTH CENTRAL CLEBURNE AND SOUTHERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 453 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cherokee Rock Village to near Piedmont to near Ragland to 6 miles northeast of Odenville, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Anniston, Oxford, Pell City, Jacksonville, Rainbow City, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, West End-Cobb Town, Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Lincoln, Glencoe, Weaver, Ashville, Riverside, Ragland, Munford and Ohatchee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
